name: Sobada Ranawara Mal
short_description: Natural Dehydrated Flower Ith Diuretic Properties
description: Ranawara flowers have been widely used from generation to generation in Sri Lanka. It is a caffeine free natural tea. The Regular consumption of this Herbal Tea ensures benefits in the long term, purifies blood and detoxifies the body. Ranawara flower tea is useful in sugar related disorders. It promotes mild diuretic actions, prevents disurea and renal calculi formation, promotes clear complexion and restore skin to its natural glow. Regular use reduces body heat. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
